channel.title: Sweet and Sour
channel.description: A podcast about this Asian American life
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about this Asian American life
channel.itunes:author: katie zhu and Nicole Zhu
channel.itunes:summary: Sweet and Sour is a podcast exploring different facets of Asian American life.

item.title: Preview: Welcome to Sweet and Sour
item.description: A preview of Sweet and Sour, a podcast exploring different facets of the Asian American experience.
item.author: katie zhu and Nicole Zhu
item.itunes:author: katie zhu and Nicole Zhu
item.itunes:subtitle: A preview of Sweet and Sour, a podcast exploring different facets of the Asian American experience.

item.title: 1: The Contradictions of Being Asian American
item.description: For our first episode, katie and Nicole discuss their Chinese to American ratio with their parents, Jiming and Li, who also shared their perspective on raising kids in America. katie and Nicole discuss the contradictions of being Asian American, both as a model minority but persistent other. The inaugural Book and Essay Club kicks off with an analysis of Erika Lee's "The Making of Asian America." On Hella Asian, Nicole investigates the ubiquity of the Danish cookie tins.
item.author: katie zhu and Nicole Zhu
